English.Name: Sleep Powder
English.Category:
"Basic Information"[CS:E][BAR][CR]
Afflicts all enemies within a 1-tile
range with a [LS:13558]Sleep[LE] status condition. A
Pokemon with the [LS:13558]Sleep[LE] status is
incapable of action.
